posts.content:
This build was intended to address the Night Lords request. It's nothing earth-shattering but has a few worthwhile advantages. It has not been tested though I have played some similar builds that worked pretty well in different environments.

Role play Wizard 25/Fighter 10/Shadowdancer 5, Human, PvM

A strength-based stealth build focused on sword/shield, strong missile spells and indispellable buffs for custom RP.
The level-up guide attempts to spread out dumps as evenly as possible for playability. SD levels inserted @19 & 20 to allow use of HiPS pre-epic. Beware of taunters! Get those damage shields cookin' when venturing into unfamilar areas.

Similar ECB class split: Pseudo-Assassin by Crispy Critter... another STR-based build, but focused on dual-wield kukris, DevCrit and necromancy. It is slightly dispellable, avoids knockdown, shadow evade & defensive roll, but does sacrifice some casting power for an additional APR.
